name: Fell Nightmare
description: The Fell Nightmare is a large fiend with charred hoofprints and a fiery aura, embodying darkness and flame.
memorable: It leaves a burning trail that inflicts fire damage and ignites flammable objects.
goals: To instill fear and control the battlefield with fire.
relations: Often associated with dark riders or fiendish trainers.
environment: Typically found in dark or infernal locations.
strengths: Combines high mobility with area control through fire.
weaknesses: Low armor class makes it vulnerable to attacks.
attacks: Hooves attack deals significant bludgeoning and fire damage, and can knock opponents prone.
most_powerful_ability: Fiery Trail creates hazardous ground, dealing damage to creatures that enter it.
additional_information: Radiates an Evil aura that affects perceptions.
Grants fire resistance to its rider.
Ethereal Shift allows for strategic repositioning.
Emits bright and dim light from its fiery hooves.
test_queries: fiery fiend that controls the battlefield
fiend with charred hoofprints and telepathy
fast skirmisher that leaves fire behind
